Reviews.Content: If you want to be able to shoot with exposure bracketing, set your camera to spot metering or even force the flash on all pictures, this is not the camera for you. Indoor quality is mediocre and the video zoom is digital only, so your picture starts to look like an early Nintendo style scene as you zoom in on your subject.However, if you just want an inexpensive camera to take outdoor / well lit pictures and you aren't doing anything fancy, this one will work just fine. I just got back from a vacation during which I shot over 250 pictures on one set of batteries which are still in the camera. The eco setting turns off the screen on the back so you just use the viewfinder, and I love having a viewfinder on a point and shoot.If I had one serious problem, it would be that the actual picture taken is about 10-15% larger than what you see in the viewfinder, so you have to guess when you compose your picture, then review if you really want it right.Overall, this is a fine everyday carry camera that does its job with a minimum of fuss and expense. Remember, a high quality expensive camera safely on a shelf at home will not capture any pictures when you're out!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: frances
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great little camera with a wide angle lens.  As an added bonus it has a view finder that you would find on a much more expensive camera that comes in handy on sunny days.  Takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the dough
Reviews.Author: Leonard H. Kimball
Reviews.Content: Wow, an optical viewfinder on a lo priced camera. Plus an fast lens, easy to use functions combined with th 5X optical zoom produce more than just adequate  picture quality.

Reviews.Title: First Canon Buy!
Reviews.Author: Hailey.G
Reviews.Content: After not having a high quality camera for seems like over a decade, I'm extremely happy with this purchase. This is the first Canon I've ever had (and I've really been wanting to delve into this brand). I mainly bought this for a trip I'll be going on soon and since I've been going through all the settings and taking random pictures, again I'm VERY happy about the quality this camera gives. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants a first time great quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Dania
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera, and the price was very reasonable. The only thing is that you have to buy a memory card in order for it to work!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Cerveau
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take pictures of my products so they could be uploaded to my online store, works great. Video is a little grainy in poor lighting though. Heavy for the size, feels durable. I haven't dropped it yet and I don't plan to.

Reviews.Title: Love this powerful little camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberley J Converse
Reviews.Content: Just went to a Red Sox game where I was getting flack from others with large cameras. The images mine captured are great. Works great in low light conditions too.This camera was a great value too.It's my "carry everywhere" camera for capturing images.

Reviews.Title: great median price camera
Reviews.Author: rachel k hartley
Reviews.Content: nice little camera great price does what it is supposed to do, zoom may look fuzzy on the view finder but pictures come out clear.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: I looked all over the internet to find a point and shoot camera with a viewfinder, and finally found this great little camera. It has all of the features I wanted including video with sound, without costing a ton of money.  It's size and weight makes it easy to take anywhere, and takes decent photos without a lot of fuss.  Perfect addition if you had a SLR camera,  if you  use a camera infrequently, or for someone just starting on the road to photography.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera for the price
Reviews.Author: bbbbadwizard
Reviews.Content: If you need a small easy to use digital camera this is the one.  Takes great pictures and easy to use. Carry it inmy coat pocket all the time.  If I loose it I am not out a lot of money

Reviews.Title: Best Combo for Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: James S Wilhelm
Reviews.Content: After two other point and shoot cameras, which were OK, this one combines all the features I wanted.  Bonus- the chip fits all my other cameras, and the slot in the front of my desktop.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A1400
Reviews.Author: DeanO2
Reviews.Content: very clear viewing screen sharp detailed images light weight and small size good low light images but complex settings hight battery consumption

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Baker
Reviews.Content: I wanted a compact easy to use camera and this one is perfect. Great zoom, great photos, great videos. Perfect for the beginner or the pro photographer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: C'lene R.
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality. Easy to use. Just the battery downside. I would recommend this purchase to anyone interested in purchasing it.

Reviews.Title: Grab This Camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: aeromom
Reviews.Content: I love the idea of having a viewfinder!!!! Have been searching since I had my last digital camerastolen, which also had a viewfinder.  It comes in so handy on very bright days.Your camera  takes Great  pictures.!! Even my 2y/o granddaughter uses it.I enjoy your product VERY much!!Aeromom

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Kath
Reviews.Content: Takes very nice pictures, but it is a little confusing to find all the things that the camera does.  Have to get on line to find more directions for camera.

Reviews.Title: Professional photographers everyday solution
Reviews.Author: Chris Umaña
Reviews.Content: I bought this little fellow in a bargain, and is one of the greatest investments i've done.Easy to use, fits in my pants pockets, sharp images, vivid colors. Not for use in AUTO mode, it is ok, but if you want take control use LIVE or P.With rechargable batteries and the ECO mode, it's charge will last for several days. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for not a lot of money
Reviews.Author: JagLite
Reviews.Content: So far it is working great for me.I like that it uses regular batteries that I can carry spares for.I really like the old style viewfinder since I can't see the large preview in outdoor conditions with any camera.Excellent for the relatively low cost.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value!
Reviews.Author: Stuart K Jarman
Reviews.Content: A quality camera at a bargain price (below suggested retail!), this does everything I could ask of it, and does it well: great photo quality, easy to use, handy features such as the 3 photo 'burst' setting for the self timer.  Battery life appears much better than previous models I have owned, and the ability to accept regular AAA batteries without separate cords or chargers is a definite plus.  Very pleased with it and would recommend this camera to anyone, whether a first time or experienced user.

Reviews.Title: "Battery exhausted" error makes this camera useless.
Reviews.Author: JDK "cougarfan2"
Reviews.Content: This is my second A1400.  I returned the first because of "change battery" problems....after a few minutes, the camera acts as if the batteries are exhausted and it shuts down.  I returned my first purchase to Canon (it was out of the Amazon 30-day return warranty), with little problem, they sent me a new unit.  The problem is that the second unit has the same problem...it's just useless.  I originally had an A1300, which I liked, but I dropped it and damaged it.  This newer model certainly needs some sort of firmware fix.  It does have a viewfinder, the only pocket camera that does and the pictures it takes (when it's able to take a picture) are fine.  Also, the Canon photo software is clunky and too complicated, another step downward.  I think I'll spend more money and go back to a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy for the money, and with a view finder.
Reviews.Author: michael yardich
Reviews.Content: A little grainy, but the viewfinder is a rare thing to have included with the new digital computers. The other plus is it takes AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: topdawg119
Reviews.Content: arrived on time and in good shape. Battery life is not terrible, but not great. shoots good video. Takes very good stills for a point and shoot. Controls are not very intuitive - I own/owned a metric assload of digital cameras and I had challenging time figuring out the basic controls on this one. Maybe it was just me...I would buy it again as it is priced right, is small and takes very good pix for price and size.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Shopaholic
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pictures and I love the AA battery component.  Batteries are always available.  Camera is very small and pocket sized too.  Overall a great value.  I bought it as a gift and now I want one for hiking when no charger is available for days.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: georgia mackinnon
Reviews.Content: very nice ,. would have been nice if it came with a SDS card or at least stated i would have needed one.

Reviews.Title: surprizingly small
Reviews.Author: djuno1966
Reviews.Content: got this today and went to run my canines.  It took very decent pictures.  Have yet to try the video.  It fits my pant pocket nicely and should be a hit in the nudie bars.

Reviews.Title: Decent product but price might be too high
Reviews.Author: Henry Hannible
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for someone that is new to cameras or even for a child., I was dissappointed at the quality being that it is a canon product. it felt cheap and plastic. Additionally, it is extremely difficult to navigate through all of the features described as one would have to keep scrolling back through various screens in order to get to the desired settings.Picture quality is good and theonly drawback is the inability to switch the resolution. Sometimes, one might want to take a pic in less resolution for uploading purposes.

Reviews.Title: Replacing an older model
Reviews.Author: Elena Heiden
Reviews.Content: Prompt delivery. Good price. Compact and easy to use. Some controls too close to thumb position takes time to get used to.

Reviews.Title: Was a present
Reviews.Author: S. Noyes
Reviews.Content: Can't give it 5 stars because I'm not using it, so don't know details... Bought it as a present for a daughter who just had a baby. Grandparents are getting good pictures! What else can I say?

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: BJ T.
Reviews.Content: I especially like the view finder... great for taking pictures in bright sunlight when you can't normally see the screen.  Easy to use, I even figured out how to easily shut off the flash!  (Nearly impossible with my previous camera!) Easy to download photos to my desktop.  So far, absolutely no problems.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gordon
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for my part time job doing residential homeowners insurance inspection, I take photo's both inside and out, the camera is a good match for me, it takes excellent photo's plus when out side in the West Texas sun I can use the viewfinder when the sun makes the screen totally black. Outstanding point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Artushin
Reviews.Content: This is a small compact camera that is easy to hold while taking your photos.  I bought this to take on vacation as it is easy to carry in my purse or pocket.  It requires 2 AA batteries and I recommend the extended life batteries as they last much longer.  Cost a bit more but are worth the price.  This camera is very affordable and has all the necessary functions to take good shots.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: griffin
Reviews.Content: Still trying to figure this out... when to zoom and when to video... fun though! Seems real good regarding clarity....

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Paula Fredin
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that I could carry in my purse and this fits the bill. I like the large viewing screen and the quality of the pictures. I also really like the fact that it also has a viewing window, if you need more stabilization when taking the shot.  The only minor draw back is that it takes the camera a few seconds to recharge the flash after every shot. Overall I would recommend this camera

Reviews.Title: I got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Entity
Reviews.Content: It was on sale after Christmas for $58.99, so I thought I'd give it a shot. (No pun intended.) Well, it's a $59 camera. Takes good photos of things that don't move. In good light. With the zoom at 5x, photos are a bit grainy. If you extend it all the way out to 20x (max), the photos are very grainy and have some color separation. The display makes everything look pixelated; the photos look better on the computer than they do on your LCD. As with every camera I've owned, the flash drains the living essence from the batteries in about 5 or 6 shots. The recovery time is slow. If you want to take pictures of scenery or buildings or statues, this camera is probably worth your money. If you want a camera that takes good close-up shots or good shots of things that move, you'll have to spend more money. I got a 12-megapixel Canon PowerShot SX510 HS with 30x zoom for Christmas. $200, but it's a fantastic camera.

Reviews.Title: The gift
Reviews.Author: kris kauffold
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my best friend.  He had a problem seeing the image in the video screen, so needed a viewfinder.  It is extremely hard to find one these days.  He loves it!  It is lightweight, easy to use as a point and shoot, and the benefit of over the counter batteries is a definite bonus. The best part is the price, and the quality of photos it takes.  I recommend this little camera to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: rednow
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for the A1300 that I dropped!  :- (  The camera is almost as good but takes longer time between shots than the previous one.  Recommend it but would prefer the other Powershot.

Reviews.Title: Great little beginner camera..
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: The camera is nice for beginners or travel because it is small. I love the retro-looking design and the view finder, which is uncommon in digital cameras. It fits nicely in a small bag or purse. Would definitely recommend keeping the camera in economy mode because battery life is short with normal use.. A couple downsides are the plastic case it's in, making it feel fragile, and the poor quality of the photos. Many come out blurry and a little out of focus even with a high shutter speed. I have tried to change settings to fix this, but to no avail. Not great for sports shots, but settings on the camera allow for plenty of artistic experimentation. The slow shutter speed would be fun to try with sparklers at night to create light drawings in pictures! All in all, good for the price if you're not looking for high quality.

Reviews.Title: Girlfriend loves this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Rhodus
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend and she loves it! Works great and not a bad  camera for the deal I got on it. The picture quality isn't amazing, but what can you expect for a good price?

Reviews.Title: Fills the Bill
Reviews.Author: 2rallan
Reviews.Content: I had an aged Fujifilm digital camera that was on it's last legs, and wanted something lighter and simpler to use (I'm technically-challenged).  This one fills the bill very nicely.  It takes 2 regular AA batteries, so there's no expensive batteries to buy.  I purchased a SanDisk at the same time, and after reading the simple instructions, was able to immediately take photos and download them to my computer.  It's a winner for me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent...
Reviews.Author: Michael P Jessome
Reviews.Content: I've had a few digital cameras, but this one was the best all-purpose camera with a view-finder, at a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: Prefect for what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Thelen
Reviews.Content: I lost my camera around halloween and desparately needed a new one with my growing children.  This takes great pictures and excellent video.  The only thing I don't like about it is the length of the delay between taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Ramon Valverde
Reviews.Content: was smaller than I expected, nice size though all the bells and whistles needed to take photos all day long would buy another if I needed another

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Cherden
Reviews.Content: Saw this in Best buys and found it cheaper on Amazon.This is a nice little camera, palm size. Has a zoom feature, records video, haven't done that yet.Easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Johnfam
Reviews.Content: Bought this just to have a ready option to capture photos all day long. Works well, though subdues light or night time photos are not as clear as I would have liked. Great close up shots and wonderful clarity. Real easy to use and navigate. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Handy camera for backpacking or riding
Reviews.Author: Franronly
Reviews.Content: This is one of the few (or perhaps the only) small digital camera that has a view finder. Digital screens are VERY annoying to use in bright sunlight. This one functions like a real camera. It's small enough to fit in your pocket or pack. Since we're riders and hikers, this is a big plus. It takes good pictures. Could use a more telephoto lens. This is the third one we've owned over the last few years because of error operator in dropping it...and a new puppy chewing it.....and got better each time we purchased it..

Reviews.Title: great little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: katherine
Reviews.Content: This is a great little cannon camera.  To me the best feature is the view finder.  I had a hard time finding a small camera that had this feature.  I find it hard to take pictures on sunny days with cameras without a viewfinder.  The pictures are of great quality for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Science Guy "MP"
Reviews.Content: I carry and shoot a Nikon D800 but I have been looking for a long time for a very compact point and shoot that I can stick in my pocket for those occasional shots when my big camera may not be accessible.  This is perfect.  Takes AA batteries and has a viewfinder which is getting almost impossible to find on a point and shoot.  I don't do well taking pics using the lcd display!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Phil87714
Reviews.Content: I would rather still have my Canon A620 but it E18'd recently while using it outside on a very cold day.  I miss the swivelable view screen and the speed gained by having 4 AA batteries.My priorities in deciding on the A1400 were 1) an optical view finder and 2) AA batteries. CONS - The A1400 documentation was minimal. There was no printed owner / operator manual. The flash is slow to charge because it uses only 2 AA batteries.  PROS - The camera is small enough to stick in my shirt or jacket pocket. That makes it easy to carry. This is a great camera for general use. Great for a trip to the zoo or a hike in the woods. The images are big so you can zoom in and capture excellent detail.  It has a battery charge indicator that comes on when the batteries get low.The A1400 does not have the same options as the A620 but for the price the A1400 does a good job.

Reviews.Title: The camera is very hard to use the Features!
Reviews.Author: Retired Greyhound Owner
Reviews.Content: I think the camera is too small and therefore it is too hard to handle and the pictures are hard to take. The features are hard to use I liked the older modal better

Reviews.Title: Pocket size / big performance
Reviews.Author: Janet G. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: The view finder is the icing on the cake of this little gem. Compact, regular AA cells and stick in your pocket, who could ask for more. It will find a place in my wife's purse. Seems like a better option than  using a smart phone. Pictures are for cameras not telephones.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: lucy plaza
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera tho its reg batteries its actually worth it.....continue to do great job, as for i am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Liked my easy share better!
Reviews.Author: Katie C.
Reviews.Content: work photo transferred from my photo file onto my co.'s wbsite  right side up,my other camera and phone camera never did that. The photo downloaded fine into my picture file?! Gonna call cannon to see if they can help me with this.I do like the view finder ,which my easy share did not have ,and is hard to find on point and shoot cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Bob Mac"
Reviews.Content: I could not  believe the many controls and features offered by this camera.I have not had a camera since the 70's with a AE1 and find this little beautyalmost as good. If you really want to get the most out of it, download the PDFfile instruction manual. It has a wealth of information. I am still trying to use all thedifferent settings and aqm having a ball.

Reviews.Title: Optical viewfinder!!!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Allan Roberts
Reviews.Content: The only modern camera with an optical viewfinder. This is very helpful when I am out in the woods in direct sunlight. The screen is all but invisible, making my other camera useless. And it is a simple-to-use Canon A-series. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera not much to complain about for the price
Reviews.Author: ben akin
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera if you consider the price and what it does. I could have gotten the cheaper A2500 model but I stuck with this one because of the design which has a better hand  grip and the viewfinder unlike the flat a2500 which easily slip out of one's hands. Also feature wise , there isn't much difference between the a2500 and a1400 Picture quality is good for the camera but it does struggle in low light settings. it was also quite surprisingly small and can fit in a chest pocket. video recording quality is good at 720p HD recording  with excellent audio recording and playback. it is relatively easy to setup and can just leave it on auto to do it own thing. There are so many settings to toy with ,experiment and configure to get the desired effect. All in all ,I am enjoying my new camera and hope it stay functional. Canon has made and excellent point and shoot camera I implore people to buy it if you need a portable camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate, takes nice pictures, light weight just right for all pictures.  Highly recommend.  Get asked where I bought it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT.
Reviews.Author: Jane Delman
Reviews.Content: My old Canon stopped working and I held out till I saw one that could take it's place.  Easy to use and still with a multitude of functions.

Reviews.Title: A perfectly Nice Little Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Mack Hall
Reviews.Content: My good ol' Elph 7mp finally faded after years of hard use.  I miss its steel case and classy style, but this replacement is working out fine.  I fail to understand complaints -- this is a nifty little vade mecum (that's, like, Latin, like, y'know) that does what it is designed to do and as advertised.  For heavy lifting I have my Canon Rebel (yes, I'm a complete amateur).Last year I bought the Nikon J1 as a pocket camera.  It broke.  Nikon did not honor its own written warranty, but in compensation I enjoy telling people why it's held together with rubber bands.  That is my first and last Nikon.  Unless Canon has changed in the home office, they honor their warranties.

Reviews.Title: A1400 Digital Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Rick S.
Reviews.Content: So far so good! I love it, lots of bells and whistles. If you get this Camera USE a case don't stick it in your pocket (any of them) or drop it in a purse. the telescope lens will get dirty and stick on you, causing it to shut down and not work, do not take pictures in a sand storm. it will make movies audio is good, heck for the price you can't beat it. just keep it out of harms way.buy the Energizer ch4wb4 recharge Smart AA/AAA charger with the NiMH batteries, they last 30% longer than any others on the market, with my 16GB card and those batteries I filmed for a 1 1/2 with audio, try that with anything else.only con -Amazon sent me a broken one first, but they quickly sent me a replacement camera. jard is shipping and it was bubble wrapped, Lens Shut down, so you need to treat this camera like a camera not a ceil phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Margaret Sweet
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice point and shoot camera and very easy to use. Not designed for a professional photographer but great for the casual user like me.

Reviews.Title: Greatest deal in compact cameras
Reviews.Author: Richard Lee Fulgham "Richard Lee Fulgham"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  "Science News" ran an article proving that it's possible for a human being to actually fall in love with an inanimate object.  Well, I'm in love!  I bought an earlier version of this camera (A1200) several years ago.  Though I have a DSLR system including two Canon cameras (20D and 10D) and 17-40L, 200L, 70-200L top notch lenses, I always grab my little Canon A1200 when I go anywhere.  This little jewel has a real, bright, "tunnel" viewfinder as well as a large (2.7"), brilliant LCD.  This is not to mention a five power Canon lens!  Frankly, I see this camera as the little brother of the pro Canon G series -- I have the G10 model and the A1400 almost matches it when its photos are enlarged to 8" X 10".  Don't underestimate the capabilities of the A1400's 1/2.3 sensor!  Take a portrait of a lovely young girl and see every eyelash, every hair, every gleam in her eyes.

Reviews.Title: It's a good camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Dostie
Reviews.Content: I like the peep hole for days when the sun takes your screen away and It fits in pockets when your hands are full.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for World travelers
Reviews.Author: fred agharokh
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for two weeks overseas family trip with my wife. Great camera, light weight and excellent pixels were the key and the price is just right.

Reviews.Title: Decent compact POS camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Rego "Kim Rego"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to have in my pocketbook and to have when I do not want to bring the trusty Canon 40D with the rest of the gear. I also like having the quick access to a camera vs. unpacking the 40 from the backpack, great for quick snaps of the furbabies doing something silly or cute, and snapping some pics for eBay, etc.I liked the ability to put in a pocket and the viewfinder. This was one of the few that had a true viewfinder. I like the AA battery use, no need to carry a charger and a couple betties can always be stuffed in a bag or picked up. The wide angle zoom appeals to me too.I’ve snapped a few pics and uploaded and am pretty satisfied.While nothing will replace the 40 and the interchangeable lens…this is a very good camera for the convenience, ease of use, and the $$. Great little camera for a gift for someone to play and see if they want to get into photography and a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gifts for granddaughters
Reviews.Author: ginny
Reviews.Content: We bought four of these for Christmas presents for out granddaughters aged 15, 12, 10, and 9.  They work well and take still pictures and video.  They have been using them a lot and are enjoying them.  We checked prices at local retailers and Amazon had the best price on these cameras

Reviews.Title: Like the viewfinder
Reviews.Author: Charles Frosolone
Reviews.Content: Mostly I got this camera because it had a viewfinder. IT was inexpensive and had all the other capabilities of a similar priced digital, but it was the view finder. I do a lot of pictures in the sunlight or of moving objects and without a view finder it is very difficult or impossible to see what you are photographing. Pleased so far, but Canon could have put the cable in to transfer pictures to my computer (cheap!)

Reviews.Title: Canon A1400 Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Harmon "Florida Maveric"
Reviews.Content: Well made and very small to carry.  Takes clear photos and offers a very good zoom.  Uses standard batteries so that is a plus.

Reviews.Title: A bargain of a camera
Reviews.Author: wiltay
Reviews.Content: This is the third and best PowerShot I've owned. The last one needed photoshop adjustment on nearly every shot and this one rarely needs much of anything.  It takes well-exposed, sharp pictures almost every time. The only gripe I have about it is the elimination of the selector knob on top.  Now to change modes and go through the menus you must negotiate a confusing, complicated relationship between two buttons which I have yet to master consistently.  They eliminated the dial on top because it was easy to accidentally change modes, but I had long since learn to check it so for me it was an unnecessary and unwelcome 'fix.'  The viewfinder to me is essential for composing shots and getting hard to find. I keep the display turned off and the batteries last forever.  I have a big SLR but I carry this around when I don't want to be encumbered with it, such as in social situations where I can stuff it in my pocket when i feel like it.  Of course the optics aren't equal, but the processing is excellent.  .

Reviews.Title: I love the view finder
Reviews.Author: Loretta Pirozzi
Reviews.Content: The ONLY camera I could find that has a view finder for those days when it is so bright that  you can't see the screen.  I have bought several of them over the past several years mostly because it does what I want and it's amazingly cheap.

Reviews.Title: its pretty and love the quality
Reviews.Author: Teobaldo Araya
Reviews.Content: this rating because i don't have a camera than cool, and the video rec in hd awesome! i missed the bag and a SD

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: DuffyPhoto
Reviews.Content: I use this camera on a regular basis ... in low light night club conditions ... and in bright outdoor landscape situations ... mostly for internet use but have also made enlargements of favorites with nice results

Reviews.Title: Had to return this camera and its replacement within days
Reviews.Author: Jay DeKing
Reviews.Content: This camera takes decent enough pictures for the price, but the first one had an assembly flaw in the optical viewfinder that created double images and fuzziness; the viewfinder was useless. I returned it within a few days of purchase and the replacement arrived a couple of days later. The viewfinder on this one was much better, though still not great.One week later, the viewscreen on the back of the camera stopped displaying anything from the lens when in Auto mode. In Live mode, the screen worked normally, but in Auto mode only menu text and on-screen displays worked; no picture. The camera still took pictures, but in point-and-shoot mode there was no preview.I'm returning this one, too. For $16 more I can get a Nikon Coolpix.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Sanya Polar
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my dad. Easy to use and clear menu options! The additional eye viewfinder is a plus on these type of cameras, specially when shooting in bright light or inclement weather! Highly recommend buying rechargeable AA in packs of 4; that way you always have a backup. Camera uses only 2!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Laura Shaw
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 9 year old who wanted to take pictures and short movies. I works well and is very dependable.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A1400 camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Zeitlow
Reviews.Content: It's fine for an inexpensive camera.  I think the directions for setting the time and date could be written more clearly.

Reviews.Title: Simple but delivers.
Reviews.Author: jmm
Reviews.Content: Compact little camera that takes pretty good quality pictures. At first it seemed a little tinny but it is put together well and the lightness of it may give off the first impression of it being cheap. It is a basic camera compact and easy to use and carry without a lot of bells and whistles. Navigating the menu options is a little sloppy the way they set it up, if you want a compact camera that isn't fancy and takes pretty good pictures and you don't want to spend a lot of money, then this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Lanecia Johnson
Reviews.Content: Good for price. I wanted this camera so I could carry it around instead of hauling my huge one around. Needs to come with manual. Set up is alittle confusing

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: SUSAN
Reviews.Content: The look through view window helpful when taking pictures.  The on/off button on top can be accidentally pushed easier than my previous camera which has resulted in unexpected dead batteries but it is not enough of a problem to send it back or not chose it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, right out of the box.
Reviews.Author: kudu1
Reviews.Content: I just returned another camera from another company, which required about an hour of reading just to get it to work, and after a month of trying, it never did work right. Too many damn bells & whistles. The reviews on this Canon model looked promising, and I was able to start taking pictures with it in about 5 minutes right out of the box. (Of course I'm a guy, I mess with stuff first & then read the directions) Still, with just a few minutes of reading, the basic functions got figured out & I ran all around the house & yard taking test photos everywhere. Not a bad shot in the batch. Then I found out quite accidently that it was already compatible with my Mac's I-Photo program. Just plugged it in & the photos downloaded, ready for me to process. This one's a keeper.

Reviews.Title: A nice camera for family photography
Reviews.Author: Timothy B. Riley
Reviews.Content: I was a professional photographer in the past and was also in the wholesale photographic industry for over 20 years.  I have to admit that I am somewhat irked when I see people using their cell phones to document their lives and, more importantly, the lives of their children.  Digital cameras are so affordable now that there is no reason not to have a decent camera camera with you when you are on vacation or doing something with the kids.I bought this camera for my adult daughter (35 years old, married and with two children) for Christmas when they were all visiting me.  They shot over a hundred photos when they visited the San Antonio Sea World; the River Walk and several other local attractions.  The photos were far superior to cell phone pics due to the camera's zoom lens, it's better resolution and the fact that it has a viewfinder, which I think is much better for photographic composition.Among the features that I liked about this camera is that it uses AA batteries instead of a proprietary rechargeable battery.  This can be very helpful for the occasional photographer, especially when they are traveling.  My daughter and her husband seem very happy with this camera and I had the chance to use it when they were visiting me.  I think that it is a great value and a decent camera for family and vacation photography,

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce CARPENTER
Reviews.Content: A gift for my granddaughter this year. It takes great photos. She will soon be a famous photographer with this fine tool.

Reviews.Title: Good !
Reviews.Author: Jitender Semwal
Reviews.Content: Expectations were quite high but overall its good and good to click pictures on parties price worthy but view finder is not good enough.

Reviews.Title: Nice !
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Jones
Reviews.Content: I'm really loving my new camera .EASY to use for all ages. Editing made easy. I do recommend this camera for anyone who likes taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kurcan
Reviews.Content: Good camera, but the lack of tactile controls is a little bothersome - modes are now only accessible through menus, which takes longer to access... But a good camera nonetheless!

Reviews.Title: super light weight.. amazing picture quality
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: when i opened this i thought its soo light  feels like a toy.. then i took some pics with it and omg.. this camera is amazing...  takes great pictures!!  great for the price too

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Peter S. Klein "pkmaven"
Reviews.Content: This camera is the easiest "point and shoot" camera. It's high megapixel makes crystal clear pictures and is super small.

Reviews.Title: awesome value
Reviews.Author: denette sears
Reviews.Content: just had a new addition to family...now we can have great quality memories every step she makes...she loves the camera already

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: CJK "CJ"
Reviews.Content: I specifically like that although its small it is easily held as my hands are clutzy.  No book comes with it and the online book seemed more tedium than convenient.  It's not a difficult camera to figure out.  Simple, sweet and to the point and takes video.  Pics are good.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Jan M. Friedeck
Reviews.Content: Just enough "bells & whistles" for me.  Looked at quite a few reviews before I purchased this camera.Now I know I chose the right one!!  Great camera for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Bennett "jme"
Reviews.Content: Only downside my spouse didn't like was that it is definitely plastic. Has many settings so you can take a great picture under about any circumstance.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: jason d powell
Reviews.Content: Good quality just small. real small. Almost to hard to use with these man hands. But great product nun the less

Reviews.Title: bad camera, ok now
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas.  Every picture we have taken with this camera is fuzzy.  I didn't get around to returning it until it was too late so now I'm stuck with a terrible camera that we are never going to use.There are little or no instructions with this camera.  I went thru the menu again and found a setting on or off for eye shutter.  Now what's that?  It was off so I turned it on, and now the camera takes a good picture, no longer fuzzy.  So, what's eye shutter, well it's the fuzzy picture setting.Good luck

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I personally don't like the cameras on the new phones.  I love taking pics but don't need all the advantages or bulky size of a digital SLR.  I had a Canon before and it took great pics but unfortunately it took a swim during a fishing trip.  This replacement is great.  Easy to use and the pics are not bad at all if you set it up before shooting.

Reviews.Title: Product is good
Reviews.Author: Subanibegum
Reviews.Content: yesterday I  reeived my camera canon powershot A1400 16.0MP Digital camera with 5x  I was eagerly waiting  to take a pic and  you have  provided 02 batteries but no memory card a bit disappointment ..

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive pocket camera
Reviews.Author: R. Piltzer "Rocklen"
Reviews.Content: For a little more than the cost of three throw away digital cameras, why not have one that will last for years.  Not the most sophisticated cameras I have owned but a great little, take with you and don't worry, camera that fits in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: monique smith
Reviews.Content: perfect little camera for everyday moments. this is the third camera ive ever owned but I use it daily and it is really easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot A1400
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Harding
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera after reviewing user ratings and Consumer Report.  I am pleased with my selection, as I was looking for a small camera that takes quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: CHRISTMAS PRESENT
Reviews.Author: Evanow
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera as a Christmas present this year and it was a huge hit. Outstanding picture quality. Easy to use and has all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: camerea
Reviews.Author: Gary Mc Daniel
Reviews.Content: I bought this cause I like what it doze. I like the camera,I like the zoom on it to bring things closer. it's easy to use, 2 AA batteries n a card. I've take pictures n videos out door n they come out great n download great to. There is a lot of functions it does so will take time to get use to it all. I think it's a fun camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon makes the Best
Reviews.Author: P. BAKER "Tall Paul"
Reviews.Content: I wanted another camera that had a View finder as I shoot a lot of pictures in the sun. Canon is a camera you can hack to customize to your liking and setting.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Colby E. Sanborn
Reviews.Content: Have had it a month or so and no issues unlike the other Canon I bought here last year. Some flaws as others note on reviews, but for the price you cannot go wrong......

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: David Collins
Reviews.Content: worth every dime,  great pics  easy to use  does go thru batteries ( carry spares) but there AA so they are cheap  and I do take a lot of pics with it at one time , I would get it if you want an inexpensive Canon ,  when it wears out I will get another

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Alan W. Fields
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good. Takes great pictures and is very easy to use. Nice and small that fits in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Works pretty good
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Works good and good price. Seems to go thru a lot of batteries. Next one will be a rechargeable one.

Reviews.Title: Service and performance
Reviews.Author: Joel Anapolsky
Reviews.Content: Used this camera on many hiking trips, dropped several times with no damage incurred, it is a solid value for the cost, light weight, easy to operate. Photo's are high definition, easy to make a copy on a CD-R of your recent adventure with the date on your pictures. It makes many memories stay alive!

Reviews.Title: fine inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: chas b
Reviews.Content: I like the AA batteries - good for when traveling and now place to recharge.Photo quality is fine - excellent for internet post.View finder is good especially for outdoor shots.Compact - fits in my pocketGood price- good quality

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: chix
Reviews.Content: Meets my expectations completely. Takes good enough pictures, small enough to tote around easily, has an optical viewfinder and takes AA batteries. Yes, the build feels a little flimsy. What do you expect from a brand-new 16MP camera for $58? I will baby it along and it will do just fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Tammy A.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new camera.  I wish it came with directions though.Also a  cord would have been nice.  Pretty barebones.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: patricio fraser
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a fine compact camera to take in travels , and I got what I wanted , I am very pleased with it, delivery time was good, only one deatil , it didn`t came with the cable to conect to PC ,

Reviews.Title: Excellent point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: J. Hanechak
Reviews.Content: I really like this as my point and shoot. It's small enough to fit in a pocket. It operates on AA batteries and my Sanyo Eneloops work very well in it. This is my second one. I gave my Daughter in law the first one to take pictures of my granddaughter instead of a phone camera. In good light, it takes excellent pictures. In low light, not so much. I do like the fact that I can turn the flash on for fill flash. The flash does take a few seconds to recharge whether you use Alkaline or rechargeable NiMh batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: Dale Rideout
Reviews.Content: Nice Light camera ,fits in pockets easy and has a view finder ,which is good on bright days. It take nice clear pictures

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Tom Longhurst
Reviews.Content: Good clean image. Lightweight and easy to use.Looking forward to loading up the memory card on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: Great for what we wanted
Reviews.Author: Bosco's Daddy
Reviews.Content: We needed a small low cost camera to carry around for those unexpected shots.  Well this is it.  May get another one to keep ready in the car.

Reviews.Title: Camera us easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: The camera is not to difficult to use. I bought it for a senior and she had a little difficulty.  I will re show her how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: Unidentified Image
Reviews.Author: Judelia Medard-Santiesteban
Reviews.Content: I finally received this camera this week.  I bought a memory card and have taken scores of pictures.  Suddenly today, after I take pictures, I get an 'unidentified image' reading.  How can this be fixed?  I am quite disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Confusing
Reviews.Author: L. F. Lottier
Reviews.Content: This little puppy looks and handles just fine...but, one could use a technology course in figuring how to use all the applications.  To me it is confusing or maybe challenging.  Downloaded the multi page set of instructions and am working my way through them...and they are not too easy to understand either.  Will probably be a good pocket camera once I het the jist of it.  But for 50 bucks one can't complain.

Reviews.Title: AA battery driven, with a optic finder
Reviews.Author: Mao N
Reviews.Content: It is not the 'state of art' camera, but at least it is equipped with optic finder, and is driven by AA batteries, which means you can use common rechargeable batteries such as Eneloop.You may need to get use to use this camera, but it is worth trying to shoot a photo by looking into the finder than viewing the small screen.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power shot A1400
Reviews.Author: Jo Collins
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures. Arrived on time and the shipping was free. Would like to have more instructions for some of us who are not familiar with the settings.  Had to have my son help me

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Quality Photos
Reviews.Author: Holly Haynes
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera to shoot my artwork for portfolios and this was exactly what I needed. It is easy to operate and such a good price for a quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Verygood
Reviews.Author: German A Salcedo
Reviews.Content: I like it,in every way: sharp,and its features ; economic on batteries + use AA very easy to get anyware

Reviews.Title: Good Easy Camera to Use
Reviews.Author: Hummungbird24
Reviews.Content: Very easy camera to use.  I was able to use the camera with in minutes.  Battery life and flash are perfect for the novice user.  Great camera!!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Lujuana Petersen
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a great camera, and I will probably be able to rate it more after I learn how to completely operate it.  the instructions aren't not all that clear.

Reviews.Title: quite satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Clyde E. Buzzard "Student"
Reviews.Content: point & shoot with an edge. like the power off feature to save batteries. worth the price and then some;

Reviews.Title: good pictures
Reviews.Author: jeanette hall
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves this it was a Christmas present and she is always taking pictures with it really clear pictures

Reviews.Title: Its perfect
Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera. Great quality. Its also the perfect size not too big but not too small. I would recomend it its all i wanted.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Gloria Thomas
Reviews.Content: The co-worker I ordered it for has taken a few photos, and it seems to be just what he needed.

Reviews.Title: All Good
Reviews.Author: robin davis
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. Plenty of options, and a nice compact size. Great pictures, and easy to use. The seller was quick, and the product was packed well. I recommend. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: A camera for all ages
Reviews.Author: CoolRoberto
Reviews.Content: Just exactly as I wanted. Easy to use and easy to understand. Takes great pictures and good videos. I would recommend it to anybody who finds other cameras too complicated.

Reviews.Title: It is easy to use and a compact size without being too small.
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I needed it mainly for taking pictures for ebay and craigslist.  I also use it for family pictures and I love to take nature pictures.  It is a good size for me because I have large hands that have trouble operating the cameras with tiny little buttons.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot a1400 16.0 mp digital camera with 5x digital image
Reviews.Author: anthony harris
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my recent purchase of the canon powershot a1400 16.0 mp digital camera with 5x digital image, it's easy to use and the compact size makes it easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Must have practical digital camera, WITH a view finder.
Reviews.Author: Bruce E. Reynolds "Excel Expert"
Reviews.Content: You simply can't find a digital camera with this price performance combination that happens to have a traditional view finder. I love this camera and use the lithium batteries on it. It takes great pictures and is a very capable camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: james r. taylor
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. I also liked the price!! I like that it has disposable batteries instead of recharging ones.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, features, performance and price!
Reviews.Author: Highlife
Reviews.Content: Great camera, features, performance and price! Love the viewer finder in bright light I can see what I'm shooting, very user friendly controls, love the quick switch from pictures to video with a simple rec. button. The eco-battery saver setting is great got about 25 min HD video and over (80) 16 meg pictures from one charge. Love the AA batteries I use rechargeables, cheap to buy and can get AA batteries anywhere if needed on a trip. The pictures and video are very good.Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Rating  Canon PowerShot  A1400 16. MP Camera
Reviews.Author: David D. Daughtry
Reviews.Content: The camera is a good camera.I am sure that I can find a manual online, but it should have been included. I was disappointed that the camera came with no instructions and no download cord. I am stil trying to figure out some of the operations. I did however purchase a download cord separatety.

Reviews.Title: batteries
Reviews.Author: Laura Malcolm
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the camera, but somewhat confused as to why it takes regular batteries as opposed to digicam batteries.

Reviews.Title: 3 1/2 stars for this inexpensive camera.
Reviews.Author: E.D.Chalfont
Reviews.Content: I will rate the camera with 3 1/2 stars. I like the fact that it doesn't drink much juice from your battery and that it is compact, light and it has a viewfinder. The fact that this camera has a viewfinder makes me very happy. The controls are fairly easy to handle but it takes a little getting used to. It is a small, compact, inexpensive camera that will take some good photos and not so good photos. I still need more time to experiment with the settings to see how sharp the pictures come out in different lighting situations and should revisit this review in a couple of months. I never expected to get the quality photos one would get with a higher end camera. But then again, higher end cameras have more weight and bulkier to carry around. The A1400 fits easily in your shirt, jacket, or pants pocket.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: LaRita Lively
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great camera! Very good picture quality and easy to use.Would definitely recommend for a "cheaper" camera.

Reviews.Title: Finally a camera with a view finder
Reviews.Author: Wanda A. Knapp
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my Mother and, so far, it is working out great.  We both hate that you can't see the screen on cameras when your using them in the bright sun and, even if it is "old school" thinking, I still love to use a view finder while taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Bwakamba Buyondo
Reviews.Content: It  is a nice Camera and  its photoes are good  and its easy to use. No need to charge the batteries and they are available every where

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First time I have had a digital camera, so not sure how it compares to other cameras, but I went to the zoo and used it for the first time. It gave clear quality pictures that I will enjoy forever.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Ted Stalets
Reviews.Content: You could spend several hundred dollars on a nice camera, but for the price - this one takes very good pictures.

Reviews.Title: okey with price
Reviews.Author: Ambuj B.
Reviews.Content: well..... its good to have it. easy to use not great quality pictures, you can have it if you just want to take some decent pictures. and i an not an i phone user.

Reviews.Title: The viewfinder sold me!
Reviews.Author: William N. Keith Jr.
Reviews.Content: The images are great, the focusing is superb and it uses AA cells. What's not to like? Those looking for a point and shoot can't go wrong with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon A1400
Reviews.Author: C. Moore
Reviews.Content: I was on a tight budget- my camera before this one just stopped working one day after the warranty ended.Does simple shots with ease. Lack of too many controls forces you to be more creative.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: JOE REYNA JR.
Reviews.Content: my grandson loves it.takes great pictures. for the price great buy.as good as any camera on the market.all so it takes movies what he likes.

Reviews.Title: Solid compact digital camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Hall
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Nikkon Coolpix for mostly taking photos while cycling. It is my second PowerShot and it is better than the Nikkon, which are both in the same price range. What I really like about it is the optical viewfinder for times when it is sunny and impossible to see anything on a camera's LCD screen. Both devices have equivalent image quality/capabilities, but because of the Canon's optical viewfinder I am able to frame my photos better with it and, thus, have better images. Some people like the Canon because it uses batteries instead an internal rechargeable battery, though I find that a feature that can be both a benefit and a deficit, especially if you forget to bring along an extra set of AA batteries on a ride, as I did recently when the camera lost power and I missed a few photo opportunities.

Reviews.Title: ii love this camera
Reviews.Author: simmons
Reviews.Content: Okay, i love this camera yall. Even though two days after i bought it my husband miss n drop it in some water, he bought me another one of these camera because it takes great pictures nd records! Great buy.!

Reviews.Title: Canon Quality
Reviews.Author: Bea Helf
Reviews.Content: Forever a Canon fan. Next camera will be a SLR but for a point and shoot, it is quite simple to operate.simple to operate.

Reviews.Title: Upgrade from didital without viewfinder.
Reviews.Author: Hans Wolff
Reviews.Content: I bought it for one reason only. It has a viewfinder. Hurray! No more guess work of trying to see what is on the picture or within the  frame in sunlight.It has lots of features. Need to play with it for a while to write more in detail. But I do like it. Buy it if you are downsizing as I have done.I wish it had come with a storage card.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: R. G. Beland
Reviews.Content: this is the 2nd Canon PowerShot I have owned. Great camera....like the viewfinder when you can't see the screen...only point & shoot that has this.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Gina J Rogers
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how light and plastic-like this camera felt.  The photos are great, but this camera is not very sturdy feeling.  So far so good, but it was a gift to my daughter who has gone through a few cameras.  Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Jenn Velzy
Reviews.Content: nice and easy to use takes really nice pictures for a lower price point I would recommend it for young or older photographers who need something simple

Reviews.Title: Great simple point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: J. Cook
Reviews.Content: This is just the right camera for my 10 year old.  It is easy for her to use, has plenty of options for her to play around with (she likes to make videos of the pets doing everyday things), and was very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Didn't get an SD card
Reviews.Author: Loren Nakayama
Reviews.Content: The camera does what I expected, I especially like the view finder.  Most of my photography is outdoors in full sunlight and the display is often difficult to see.  The camera didn't have an SD card with it and I seem to remember seeing that a Free 8gb card came with it.  Should I have have received an SD card?

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline G Boyer
Reviews.Content: Still figuring out capabilities.  Is likely not the current model, a couple of years old I believe.  We are still trying it out, only had it a few days.

Reviews.Title: Right camera wrong DVD
Reviews.Author: william Hedrick
Reviews.Content: The camera is good but it was packaged with a DVD  that was in the Russian language instead of English. That was quite a surprise when we booted up the DVD. The camera was a gift and the family didn't want to return the whole package camera and all to get a DVD guide in English. They wanted to start using the camera that day. They returned only the DVD  without the camera in hopes of getting an exchange of the DVD. However since Amazon requires the whole package to be exchanged they are struggling along without the manual and not getting the most out of the purchase.

Reviews.Title: nice as a gift
Reviews.Author: Paris
Reviews.Content: my sister was looking for a good mobile with an  8MP camera.I got the camera instead for her :D

Reviews.Title: works perfectly for my needs
Reviews.Author: Dr. Trudy A. Gardner
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  Is relatively easy to use though some of the features are difficult to remember.  I have to keep the instructions with me.  It is one of the few cameras that has a view finder which I find necessary in outdoor light.  It is really light and compact and perfect for travel.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Joanie "Jo"
Reviews.Content: Two reasons I picked this camera. It has a view finder because you can't always see the screen in the bright outdoors. Second, the batteries. I don't have to carry a battery charger when I travel. If my batteries run down when I am on the go, I can always find AAs. I use rechargeable AAs and have had no issues mentioned in previous reviews. I do use the newest kind, which may hold the charge better. Takes great photos. It's a great pocket camera when I don't want to take my big Canon.

Reviews.Title: Got it today and returning it ASAP
Reviews.Author: Little Bites
Reviews.Content: The battery repository is in the same compartment as the memory card. The lid and hinge are flimsy and poorly designed. It takes a lot of pressure to close the lid and the elongated design has the narrow end next to the hinge, where most of the pressure is applied. I take lots of pictures and do not find this camera well made. Sorry.

Reviews.Title: Bargain Shopper
Reviews.Author: Craddock Commentaries
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional picture taker by any means.  I do, however; enjoy having pictures from every occasion.  This is a small camera that takes good pictures.  The only drawback for me is it didn't come with any instructions!  I had to ask a younger person how to operate some of the functions on the camera.  I am happy with the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Enjoy the Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: James King
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed using the Canon Power Shot A1400.  It was a very reasonable in price but takes excellent pictures. They are very easy to transfer to the computer for storage.  It's very easy to get to use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Nancy J Biernacki
Reviews.Content: I am not a tech savvy person, therefore this meets my needs.  I like the view finder as well as the little screen.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: stacey Williams
Reviews.Content: this camera replaces my earlier a 45. I forgot the batteries in it and it went bad.I like it because it is small, light and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: cranemanjerry
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my son and his fiancée, for Christmas so I can't attest to how it works but they seem to love it.

Reviews.Title: It has a viewfinder!
Reviews.Author: Judi Z
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera and took it on a cruise.  Like all Canon cameras (I've had many) it is easy to operate and takes great pictures.  I got this one for times when I want a small camera that fits well in my purse, and I don't need a big zoom.  Best of all, it has a viewfinder.  This was great when I was out in the sun and trying to frame a shot.  Also uses AA batteries, which is my preference.  All in all a nice camera that I will enjoy using.

Reviews.Title: Transition to Digital
Reviews.Author: Anglzel
Reviews.Content: I have been a FILM photographer for many, many years. This Canon is the Perfect Camera to begin the Transition from FILM Cameras to All Digital. It's affordable, the perfect size & very Easy to use. The Images are Superb, with or without using the Flash. This begins my journey to the transition to a  Professional 35mm DIGITAL Camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it! Great pocket size camera I take hiking
Reviews.Author: lea
Reviews.Content: This is a compact wide screen in the back camera. It also takes great video being 16 megapixel the detail is amazing the only negative is storage space videos being a gig at a time. It is a simple camera and takes aa batteries. I have also taken quick running dog photos with out much blurring!

Reviews.Title: Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Judy A. Springmire
Reviews.Content: Nice small purse size with optional view finder and fairly simple to operate.  Compares to my Sony digital in format and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Hank Craft
Reviews.Content: I love the Canon brand. This camera is compact and does everything I wanted to do. Picture quality is in the upper level.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad little camera
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 12 year old grandson. Just developing an interest in photography.  Thought this would be a good start.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: chris stark
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and has a nice quality feel.  I like the optical view finder, most point and shoot cameras do not have this feature any longer.  Has some noise in the image in low light conditions.

Reviews.Title: canon power shot a1400 16.0 mp digital camera with 5x digital image
Reviews.Author: Rocco J. Defilippis
Reviews.Content: this is my first canon power shot i love it it takes butty full photos and it is light wight good guy i wood rec amend buying this camera .rocco defilippis

Reviews.Title: very happy with my camera
Reviews.Author: Dorothy VerMeer
Reviews.Content: It meet all my needs.Only complaint that the cord for thecamera did not come with it.It does a great job.

Reviews.Title: Economy camera with a viewfinder
Reviews.Author: cooksmtn
Reviews.Content: Our only camera was malfunctioning right when we needed it. We prefer a camera with a viewfinder for the many times the screen is washed out by our bright sunshine. We also needed  some basic adjustability for photos used to sell products online.There are very few basic cameras with a viewfinder. I've been very happy with my previous Canon, so we ordered this one. It was a great price, more features than we need, and smaller and lighter than the previous camera.It arrived quickly. We are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Very user friendly camera.
Reviews.Author: papa1615
Reviews.Content: I would recommend to anyone that wants quality pictures without a lot of camera set up and adjusting.I just view image on LCD and shoot and walla a great looking picture. If you don't have one, buy one,you'll  love it!

Reviews.Title: does a reasonable job
Reviews.Author: catflowerbear
Reviews.Content: Close ups are not sharp and it does not focus quickly.  It does a good job of giving you the basic just remember this kind of shop but not a good camera to get "that great shot" of birds and scenery. It is limited.  Like the battery and it is easily ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Camera purchase
Reviews.Author: Mike Wray
Reviews.Content: It is a Canon and my wife likes their products.  It is a familiar item that she is comfortable using.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, But Expected More
Reviews.Author: B_Mac "brmcmillan"
Reviews.Content: I do like the camera - it has the features I wanted at a very reasonalbe price.  I was surprised though that it did not come with a memory card and cord to conect it to the computer. I've bought several Canon cameras over the years and they always came with these basics.  I took advantage of Amazon's offer of a free card, but thought that would be an extra.  I've been very pleased with the performance and durability of my other Canon cameras and expect this to perform well.

Reviews.Title: $58- can't get much better
Reviews.Author: Victoria122
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old  Great little starter camera for her, most of the pictures she takes turn out.  I don't think you can get much better for the price.  Nice little size, the viewfinder is appreciated, and putting 2 AA batteries in is easier than recharging a dedicated camera batter imo.  Only thing I don't like is the flash takes a few seconds to recharge, but it tells you this on the lcd screen, so you know when the camera is ready to take another picture.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Carole
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use.  The instructions are minimal,but sufficient.  I would recommend this camera to someone else

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Vern
Reviews.Content: The camera is simple to use.  I am not a photographer and I wanted a camera that was easy to use for basic pictures.  I am pleased with my purchase.  If you want just a basic digital camera, this could fit your needs.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A 10 a smart buy
Reviews.Author: Nelson Falcon
Reviews.Content: It performs great for the price...quality pictures. compact too..lots of great features..the camera came in a reasonable time  for my son's birthday,and that made me happy.

Reviews.Title: Little small, but nice
Reviews.Author: Lenster
Reviews.Content: We've only used once or twice, but not a bad camera for the price.  It's a little smaller than I would have liked, but it takes awesome pictures and videos.  We did not need the biggest and most expensive camera.  Just something to replace our broken "dinosaur" one.  We'll defintely use this for a lot more things now and it fits in our old camera case, so we don't have to buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Conner
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother, because I borrowed her camera when I went on a trip. When her camera returned back home the shutter did not open anymore. Ooops! So, being the favorite and only son, I shopped and bought her this camera. This camera is a huge step up from the camera she had and she absolutely loves it. She says this was to be her Christmas, but I told her it is only a replacement for the camera I borrowed and returned useless. I'm glad I was able to borrow mom's old camera so I could replace the old with a new, awesome, updated camera!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: STEVE
Reviews.Content: My old small camera has a view finder, I have been looking for a new camera with a higher MP, but could not find one with the view finder feature, until Canon came out with this model.  View finders are great, especially when in high sun light.  I am able to focus on the photo to be taken without the display being washed out due to sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived before scheduled delivery, which was great since we wanted to take pics of our daughter's first Christmas.The only disappointment, and part of the blame lies with us, no cable or card come with the camera. Just the camera. I am sure somewhere in the product description it states it, but for the price, the camera performs above our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A1400 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image
Reviews.Author: Verna M Arnold
Reviews.Content: My son is enjoying his new camera even tho the flash Memory card did not come with our order.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Boulderite
Reviews.Content: I'm not familiar with all the technicalities of digital cameras, so I'll leave that to the other reviewers. I needed a basic point-and-shoot for a service trip, and this fit the bill. I wasn't expecting much, given its price ($70), but found that the pictures are crisp and clear, with vivid colors even prior to any editing jobs. Image stabilization was good, and I liked the battery compartment - it's convenient when you don't have electricity, and the slight bulge on the front helps with shaky hands. The camera itself is a good size, actually; I was expecting something a lot bigger due to the battery compartment, but it's petite and classy! All in all, a worthy buy; if your expectations don't greatly exceed the price, you'll be very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Read
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Towery
Reviews.Content: The HD recording is very nice as long as it's not too zoomed in. The camera is VERY Light and compact. Battery life isn't too glorious but then again it's just 2 AA batteries. The charging flash can be annoying but it's a FANTASTIC camera for the money

Reviews.Title: Only non-SLR Camera with an Optical Viewfinder
Reviews.Author: William V Jr
Reviews.Content: The only non-SLR camera on the market that still has an optical viewfinder...LED screens just don't cut it when your shooting pictures outdoors!

Reviews.Title: Really happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: Muskie
Reviews.Content: We have only been using it for a couple of months now but am very impressed considering the price.  It does feel light weight and cheap but it packs in a lot of features and takes excellent photos.  It is slow on the rebound and at recharging the flash but I love using only 2 AA batteries and they last, we are still on the first set.  Also still like having a view finder, and that it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Getting used to how small it is
Reviews.Author: pjoriley
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for my husband to take along on hikes in the backcountry, something small enough to fit in a shirt pocket or jacket pocket. It's plenty small for that. Also has a viewfinder, his requirement. Also, the display seems to be non-glare, which is an improvement over the old pocket camera we bought years ago. I shoot a bigger Canon, and like the bigger viewfinder that it has. But this one seems good so far. We'll know more after it gets a workout in the "field."

Reviews.Title: Useful camera
Reviews.Author: John Duley
Reviews.Content: This camera suits me fine.  It is small and carryable.  It has a viewfinder, the main reason I bought itl

Reviews.Title: I am pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Thompson "eb63968"
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews of this camera before purchasing it.  It was replacing a $300 digital camera I had owned for about 6 years.  I had worried that I would be constantly comparing them and kicking myself for not trying to get my old camera repaired.  But, so far, I've been pleased.  The flash does charge slowly.  I rarely use the flash, however.  The picture quality is comparable to my old camera.  It has many of the same features I am used to, also.  The only new criticism I have is that I tried the movie feature, and my memory card filled up in about 2 minutes.  I figured out how to reduce the picture quality and was able to tape longer.  If you're a point-and-shoot novice photographer, I think it's a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Powershot A1400 16MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: John R. Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I got this as a present for my wife.This is a nice upgrade for a real basic point and shoot using the SDHC format with AA batteries.  It is a basic camera with less functions than the early series of Cannon digital point and shoots. This helps people who turns a dial when they should not and limits other choices that could cause a picture problem. It is great for those challenged by too many choices!When using such a point and shoot, remember to leave extra room around the subject(s) when taking a picture.  With the higher meg pixels, this allows cropping and enough remaining pixels for a decent print.Every where you go you will find AA batteries.  This is such a blessing and a great advantage.Finally like most of the modern Cannon digital cameras this uses the SDHC - high capacity SD format memory card. Get a larger one (16GB or better) for vacations and you can not go wrong.  This includes the capacity of using the Eye-Fi wireless SD card WHICH IS SOLD SEPARTELY.Why only 4 stars?  There is no option for resetting the image size format.  Of all the things to remove for simplicity, this is the one thing that should have been left in. Otherwise this could have had a 5 star from me.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: B. Stone
Reviews.Content: This is not the very latest, but it is one of the few small cameras you can now buy which have an optical viewfinder, which I think very important outdoors when it is hard to see the LCD.  I also chose it because it uses two AA batteries, so that my grandchild would not find it useless if she had forgotten to charge it.  Of course, she can use rechargeable AA.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use camea
Reviews.Author: C walker
Reviews.Content: The camera was a present for my mom who wanted a simple point and shoot camera. This camera has met her needs.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: Darcy D. Cummings "DDC"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use good picture quality. This was a gift to a teen and they are enjoying taken pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: A Great Small Camera!
Reviews.Author: JOHN J DRAKE
Reviews.Content: Outstanding value. It replaces an excellent older Power Shot A530 with more capacity & features.  It is virtually impossible to find a small camera in this category with both a visual view finder and a good screen together.  A GREAT SMALL CAMERA!  Thanks Canon for making this type of camera again. Our A530 has traveled across the globe operating flawlessly. I assume the A1400 will function flawlessly for years too!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Harrell C. Gibbs Jr. "Gibbs"
Reviews.Content: Photos are good quality but I wish it had a rechargeable battery.  Everything today is rechargeable and I didn't even think to look to see if this one was before I bought it.  Yes, it's my fault, but I'd give it one or 2 more stars if it did have a rechargeable battery.  Build quality is decent but not quite what some other cannon cameras are.

Reviews.Title: Good first digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Royce Southen
Reviews.Content: I have not done a lot with it as yet. Seems to take good video clips and I like the one button for taking video clips.

Reviews.Title: View finder, light weight, easy to operate, small...Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Missouri Reader
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for an elderly parent who is "scared" of digital cameras and must use a view finder rather than the lcd screen because of poor eye sight.  I had significant requirements which were: (1) easy to operate "point and shoot" camera; (2) view finder and (3) replaceable AA batteries (so no worries if someone forgets to recharge the battery--because it's not a rechargeable battery camera).  (4) light weight (5) small camera. This fits the requirements perfectly.  Seriously, stick an SD card and batteries in it and start taking pics. No learning curve required.  If you want rechargeable batteries, remember they are available in size AA. It does have an lcd screen too if you want to use it instead of the view finder.  Could not be happier with this purchase.  It came super quickly too.

Reviews.Title: camera powershot A1400 with free 8 gig mem.card
Reviews.Author: John H Perkins
Reviews.Content: The Camera worked fine but I didn,t receive the free 8 gig memory card as promisedin the description online..

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take to Peru, as mine had died.  I was pretty nervous taking an untested camera on an amazing adventure.  But, it worked great!  The photos are amazing (for a point and shoot).  All my photos turned out great, and the battery life lasted longer than my last camera, which was also a Canon PowerShot.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera
Reviews.Author: Cesar Williams
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine, total portable. My only complain is that the 8GB that according to the offer comes free with the camera.....After using it, the camera works fine, Video is very bad at nigth, camera performs verygood at night.

Reviews.Title: Throw it in your pocket and go, nothing to worry about.
Reviews.Author: James Ondricek "Nurse2"
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera to send with my son out of the country.  He does not have to worry about charging batteries in Ukraine or the different voltages of electricity.  He can just throw in a new set of batteries and he is off and running.  It is also surprisingly small and fits right in his pocket.  I like the programs and how easy it is to use.  I highly recommend this camera.  I am thinking of getting one for myself.  It is better than my camera on my phone and just as portable.  Nice job Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and brilliant picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Jacque
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera... very user friendly and takes fabulous pictures... crystal clear... I would recommend this to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this A1400 to replace an A540, love view finders! The A1400 is smaller and not as easy to use.
